title: Scenic 3-Bed Apartment with Outdoor Living in Koscielisko
description: Calling all young professionals and couples: Enjoy modern mountain living in this stylish 3-bedroom, 1-bathroom apartment in peaceful Koscielisko. With an airy 78 sqm layout, the space seamlessly blends comfort and function. Entertain or relax in the beautiful outdoor dining area, complete with views of the Tatras, and stay cozy year-round thanks to underfloor heating and air conditioning. Every detail is tailored for easy, contemporary living.
neighborhood_description: Set in Zakopane's highly sought-after Koscielisko neighborhood, this apartment is surrounded by rolling greenery, mountain trails, parks, and family-friendly playgrounds. The area’s strong sense of community, along with quick access to the highway for weekend getaways or commutes, makes it ideal for young people seeking both tranquility and connectedness.
lifestyle_benefits: close to nature trails and parks
target_buyer: Ideal for young couples and professionals who desire a fresh, well-equipped space with access to nature and community but without urban congestion.
market_positioning: This property stands out as a rare modern find in a scenic, tranquil neighborhood in Zakopane, offering top-notch finishes in a price bracket attractive to young professionals seeking their first home or a smart long-term investment.
